name: The Space Thieves
description:
Video game created with Unreal Engine 4 made in 3 weeks with 2 other people for a school project. The goal is to create an asymmetric coop game for 2 players, with the possibility to host and join a game (Only for 2 players, you can't play alone).

You and your partner will play the role of a thief and a hacker. Your objective is to infiltrate the ship and retrieve the largest diamond in the galaxy. To succeed, you will have to communicate. The Hacker will be in the central room of the ship, in the control room. The Thief will have to infiltrate to the vault. Remember, you must get out alive. If you trip the alarm, you'll only have 20 minutes before the ship self-destructs.

Controls:
ZQSD - movement (sorry I'm french)
Mouse movement - Rotate camera / look around
Mouse left click / E - Interact
Space - Jump

Credits:
Adam Cyffka as Gameplay & UI developer
Valentin Masson as Level Designer
William Petitprez as AI Developer

Most of the assets are from the Unreal Assets Store.
